links.title: Help
links.tooltip: PadoGrid GemFire Dashboards overview and help

panels.description: $Cluster: Current number of entries whose value is on the disk and is not in memory. This is true of overflowed entries. It is also true of recovered entries that have not yet been faulted in.
panels.title: Disk Regions: Entries Only On Disk

panels.description: $Cluster: The current number of bytes on disk and not in memory. It includes overflowed entries and recovered entries that have not yet been faulted in.
panels.title: Disk Regions: Bytes Only On Disk

panels.description: $Cluster: Current number of entries whose value resides in the member. The value may also have been written to the disk.
panels.title: Disk Regions: Entries In VM

panels.description: $Cluster: Total number of region entries that have been read from the disk.
panels.title: Disk Regions: Reads

panels.description: $Cluster: Total amount of time spent reading from the disk.
panels.title: Disk Regions: Read Time

panels.description: $Cluster: Total number of bytes that have been read from the disk.
panels.title: Disk Regions: Read Bytes

panels.description: $Cluster: Total number of region entries that have been written to disk. A write is done every time an entry is created on disk or every time its value is modified on the disk.
panels.title: Disk Regions: Writes

panels.description: $Cluster: Total amount of time spent writing to the disk.
panels.title: Disk Regions: Write Time

panels.description: $Cluster: Total number of bytes that have been written to the disk.
panels.title: Disk Regions: Write Bytes

panels.description: $Cluster: Total number of entries that are currently in progress of written to the disk.
panels.title: Disk Regions: Writes In Progress

panels.description: $Cluster: Total number of region entries that have been removed from the disk.
panels.title: Disk Regions: Removes

panels.description: $Cluster: Total amount of time spent removing from the disk.
panels.title: Disk Regions: Remove Time
